name: Temmy Wars
description:
This is very early access at the moment.

Most sprites are placeholder.

I am currently working on sprites.

Have you ever wanted to see a war of Undertale characters clashing at once?

Now you can with Temmy Wars! This is our second game. We had thought of this game about a year ago and at the time I was very bad at programming. I finally figured that I might as well make it now considering I have a lot of time available to me and I am far, far better at programming than before.

Anyway, you play as the Temmy in the painting in Tem Village and you create the rich history of Tem. You have to fight through a lot of Undertale characters' armies and then you take them on in a 1 - 1 battle Undertale style (this isn't complete yet).

Next Update will include;

  • Ranged units
  • Buffs and Nerfs accordingly
  • Better sprites
  • Better enemy spawning AI
  • a tutorial (hopefully anyway)

This update should come within the next 1 - 2 weeks or less.

*This project has been cancelled. Sorry!
